name: Visits
description:
Returns the estimated number of visits to a given domain.
All Traffic (desktop + mobile web).

path parameter.name: domain
path parameter.description: Enter website of interest, without 'www.' or brackets {}

query parameter.name: api_key
query parameter.description: Your Similarweb API key.

query parameter.name: start_date
query parameter.description: Start month (format: YYYY-MM)

query parameter.name: end_date
query parameter.description: End month (format: YYYY-MM)

query parameter.name: country
query parameter.description: Country filter, as a 2-letter ISO country code, or "world" for worldwide. To see the country filters you have access to, please refer to the Check Capabilities endpoint.

query parameter.name: granularity
query parameter.description: Set the granularity for the returned values. Can be 'daily', 'weekly' or 'monthly'.

query parameter.name: main_domain_only
query parameter.description: [optional] Return values for the main domain only ('true'), or include also the subdomains ('false')

query parameter.name: format
query parameter.description: [optional] Format in which the reply should be returned. Possible values: 'json' (default) or 'xml'

query parameter.name: show_verified
query parameter.description: [optional] Show shared Google Analytics data when available. Default value is 'false'

query parameter.name: mtd
query parameter.description: [optional] When 'true', end_date is set to the latest available days' data (month-to-date). To use, set granularity to 'daily'. Default value is 'false'.

name: Unique Visitors - Desktop

path parameter.name: domain
path parameter.description: Enter website of interest, without 'www.' or brackets {}.

query parameter.description: Start month (format: YYYY-MM)

query parameter.description: End month (format: YYYY-MM)

query parameter.name: country
query parameter.description: Country filter, as a 2-letter ISO country code, or "world" for worldwide. To see the country filters you have access to, please refer to the Check Capabilities endpoint.

query parameter.name: granularity
query parameter.description: Select monthly or daily granularity. In daily granularity, if you want to retrieve last 28 days, remove the start and end date parameters.

query parameter.name: state
query parameter.description: [optional] Select US state on which to filter the data. Only available when country = US, leave blank otherwise! Supported states: az, ca, ga, fl, il, ma, mi, nj, ny, nc, oh, pa, tx, va, wa.

query parameter.name: main_domain_only
query parameter.description: [optional] Return values for the main domain only ('true'), or include also the subdomains ('false')

query parameter.name: format
query parameter.description: [optional] Format in which the reply should be returned. Possible values: 'json' (default) or 'xml'.

query parameter.name: show_verified
query parameter.description: [optional] Show shared Google Analytics data when available. Default value is 'false'. Google Analytics data is not available in daily granularity.

query parameter.name: mtd
query parameter.description: [optional] Default is false. when true, end_date is set to the latest available date (Month To Date).
